String.string: May Kaia's wrath be in your hands.
Soon, Kaia will welcome you home.

Eliminate tower generals, general's escorts, tower decurions, and ebon zombies in the Ebon Tower. [You must select Ebon Tower (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring the soultrap shards to Savinu in the cave near the Ebon Tower.
